H1.text: Snow is the source from which water evaporates mostly.

H2.text: Clouds are the source from which water evaporates mostly.

H3.text: Oceans are the primary source from which water evaporates.

A4.text: 86% of global evaporation occurs over the ocean.

A5.text: Total annual evapotranspiration amounts to approximately 505,000 km3 (121,000 cu mi) of water, 434,000 km3 (104,000 cu mi) of which evaporates from the oceans.
